title: Can't open link
content:
I have been downloading a file weekly from a website. The file contains links to a daily exercise video by Pahla B Fitness. Before I activated my Pixel 4a, I was using a Pixel 2. I had no trouble opening the downloaded file, clicking the link for that day, and casting to my Roku stick on my TV.
However, once I activated my Pixel 4a, I cannot open the links. I tested the same file on my laptop, and the links work. 
I'm sure there's some setting I need to tweak, but I don't know what it is.
I'd appreciate any suggestions.
